title: Need Help on Client
body:
hey everyone
i have a problem that i need to fix
the problem is i can't open the client because it says it's not working 

it also says check online solution and close the program (basic windows error)

i tried everything but the legacy client works though

i tried to repair it from the legacy client  

i installed adobe air still it doesn't wanna open

tried to enable compatbility mode  on every setting still didn't open

and of course i tried to open it as an administrator

it didn't open so please i need help because i can't play.

thank you

replies.body: Some of those client files might have been corrupted somehow which is keeping you from being able to launch it successfully. I'd suggest grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with a **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure that you've got a fresh working copy of the game installed. Hit me back up if that doesn't help!
